name: Trove of Two
description:
The game was created at the global game jam 2022.

The theme was duality.

Description:

Play as a curious adventurer who seeks to find the treasure of a notorious pirate lord. But soon she discovers, that she is not alone. Seems like someone is accompanying her through the "Trove of Two".

You have two worlds and two characters in the game. You can switch the world at any given time to solve the puzzle.

Manual:

WASD: walking

SPACE: jumping

E: grabbing/interacting

Q: swicth character/world
